snippet: A student at Virgil I. Grissom Middle School in South Ozone Park was showing the pepper spray to friends during lunch, and, somehow, the canister discharged.
abstract: A student at Virgil I. Grissom Middle School in South Ozone Park was showing the pepper spray to friends during lunch, and, somehow, the canister discharged.

headline.main: Students Pepper-Sprayed by Classmate at Queens School
